subject: Pro pedels upgrade
description_text: As for now I have the samsonn pro pedals  . And wanting to upgrade to the newer version aswell as haptics . Just want to know what exactly i need to get for the upgrade to work smooth . Attached he'd is some photos of what I have and what im thinking of adding . Please advise if that's all I need or need to add anything else . Thanks

conversations.body_text: Hi Immanuel “GuessWhat” Podesta,  You can purchase the PlusX control box, together with the VAM or VAM Pro motors and a separate power supply. This setup will enable vibration telemetry and will also be compatible with SimHub.       https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
